skills.name: React Native
skills.prompt: Tell me about Sahil's experience in React Native as a frontend mobile application developer.
skills.description: Bringing mobile ideas to life with React Native — I build cross-platform apps that feel native and perform seamlessly.

skills.name: React Js
skills.prompt: Tell me about Sahil's experience in React Js as a frontend web developer.
skills.description: From scalable architecture to optimized rendering, I build dynamic, high-performance web apps with React at the core.

skills.name: Next.js
skills.prompt: Tell me about Sahil's experience in Next Js. as a full stack developer.
skills.description: Combining SSR, API routes, and seamless routing — I craft performant and SEO-friendly web applications using Next.js.

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.prompt: Tell me about Sahil's experience in Typescript from the frontend's perspective.
skills.description: Strong expertise in TypeScript for type-safe development, advanced types, generics, and building scalable applications with better developer experience.

skills.name: Tailwind CSS
skills.prompt: Tell me about Sahil's experience in Tailwind CSS or any other CSS framework.
skills.description: Design meets code — I craft elegant, responsive UIs rapidly with Tailwind CSS, ensuring pixel precision and clean utility-first styling.

skills.name: Git
skills.prompt: Tell me about Sahil's experience in using a Version Control system like Git.
skills.description: Version control isn't just a habit — it's second nature. I manage branches, resolve conflicts, and streamline collaboration with Git like a pro.

skills.name: Docker
skills.prompt: Tell me about Sahil's experience in using a containerization tool like Docker.
skills.description: I containerize applications with Docker for consistent and lightweight deployment — from dev to staging, effortlessly.

skills.name: Node.js
skills.prompt: Tell me about Sahil's expertise in using backend / server side tools like Node Js.
skills.description: Solid experience in server-side JavaScript, building RESTful APIs, working with databases, authentication, and deploying scalable backend solutions.

skills.name: Team Collaboration
skills.prompt: Tell me how active participation does Sahil shows when it comes to team collaboration.
skills.description: I thrive in collaborative environments — bridging communication, code reviews, and task ownership to drive team success

experiences.prompt: Write a detailed summary on Sahil's experience at Pyrack, kind of tools he worked on, experience he gained and for how long he's been working for Pyrack.
experiences.description: Leading development of enterprise-grade web applications and mentoring junior developers in a fast-paced startup environment.
responsibilities: Architected and developed scalable React/Next.js applications.
Led a team of 5 developers in implementing new product features
Optimized application performance resulting in 40% faster load times
Established code review processes and development best practices
experiences.achievements: Enhanced team productivity by implementing linting rules, establishing consistent project structures, and initiating regular team syncs to ensure smooth collaboration. Proactively contributed across multiple projects, introduced test cases to reduce production issues, and laid the groundwork for scalable development.

companyImpact.description: New features and performance improvements contributed to significant revenue increase and customer retention

personalGrowth.leadership: Transitioned from individual contributor to team lead, managing project timelines and technical decisions
personalGrowth.challenges: Learned to balance technical debt with feature delivery while maintaining code quality standards

experiences.prompt: Write a detailed summary on Sahil's experience at Mobiloitte, kind of tools he worked on, experience he gained and for how long worked for Mobiloitte.
experiences.description: Developed responsive mobile applications for diverse clients ranging from startups to large scale MNCs.
responsibilities: Built 6+ client mobile applications using React Native and modern its modern tools like Redux Toolkit (RTK), Firebase and Payment gateways
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to implement pixel-perfect designs
Integrated third-party APIs and payment systems
experiences.achievements: Gained valuable exposure to mobile application development, including app behavior and architectural patterns, contributing to both industry-standard practices and my personal professional growth.

companyImpact.description: Mid-High quality deliverables and technical expertise led to increased client retention and referrals

personalGrowth.leadership: Learned to communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders effectively
personalGrowth.challenges: Adapted to working with diverse tech stacks and tight deadlines while maintaining quality

projects.title: Task Manager

projects.prompt: Write a detailed summary on one of Sahil's personal projects, Task Manager. What was the project about? What kind of tools he worked upon? etc.
